snippet.title: PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures LAUNCH TRAILER
snippet.description:
Pac is back in an all-new experience for a whole new generation of fans.  Featuring an original storyline inspired by the show as well as all the charming characters from the highly anticipatedPAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures animated series created and produced by Avi Arad, acclaimed director and founder of Marvel Studios.  Join the adventure and help Pac and his friends fight for: Friendship, Freedom, and the Future! 
 
 
You can Buy Now here:
http://www.pacisback.com/adventures/buynow

Follow the Adventure on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/PACISBACK
 
Follow the Chat on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/namcogames
 
To learn more about the game:
http://www.pacisback.com/adventures/

Play the Adventure on:
10/29 -- Xbox 360, Playstation 3, Wii U, PC Digital
11/5 -- 3DS
